channel.title: Utorrent error
channel.description:
ok when i start up my server it works all fine untill i get to utorrent
no-ip is fine with the smiley face my server runs fine
uttorent at the bottem it has a red circle with a ! mark in it...when you hover over it it sais "listen error, you should change the listen port"
what does this mean? i am on port 43594 and when my server is not running utorrent works fine.

item.title: Utorrent error
item.dc:creator: @owner_alex1 owner alex1
item.description:
@owner_alex1 wrote:

20hpuvn.jpg1024×768
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2009, 06:59:53 am[/size][hr]that is the picture
as you can see at the bottem it has the red circle with ! mark in it

why?

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent error
item.dc:creator: @fallen543 fallen543
item.description:
@fallen543 wrote:

What you do is this.

Run utorrent, Put the portr on utorrent to a random port, Click apply, Run your server, And while its running, Go back to utorrent, And change the port it changed it to (Random port) to 43594, Click apply again, While run.bat is running.

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent error
item.dc:creator: @owner_alex1 owner alex1
item.description:
@owner_alex1 wrote:

that dosnt work…when i run utorrent before i run my server on my server run it will say
“error : unable to start up listener on 43594 - port already in use?”

the listener thingy must have something to do with it?

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent error
item.dc:creator: @fallen543 fallen543
item.description:
@fallen543 wrote:

Put random port on, So its like 22044 or whatever, Then run your server, Then, While its running, Change the port back to 43594, See if that work’s, Works for me

Read full topic
